Intro
Types of ML & respective algos & examples

PreProcessing
Mean, Median & Mode
How to handle Null values
How to handle Duplicate values
df.drop(['CustomerID', 'AdvertisingPlatform', 'AdvertisingTool'], axis = 1, inplace = True) axis =1 & inplace means?

EDA
Explain sns.histplot(data = df, x = 'Age', kde = True)
Explain sns.histplot(data = df, y = 'AdSpend', hue = 'Conversion', kde = True)
Explain df['Conversion'].value_counts()
Explain g = sns.catplot(
    data=df,
    x = 'CampaignType',
    hue = 'Gender',
    col = 'CampaignChannel',  
    row = 'Conversion',
    kind = 'count',
    height = 4,
    aspect = 1
)
Explain Box Plots of Numerical Columns
Explain sns.boxplot(data = df, x = 'Gender', y = 'Income')
Explain heatmap

Model Building
Encoding Techniques
Split Data into dependent & independent variables
Standardization & Normalization & standard deviation
transform() & fit_transform()
SMOTE, Tomek, SMOTETomek
oversampling & undersampling
